Headline: #35 31st/35th Temporary Reroute near 35th/Paulina
ShortDescription: 35 31st/35th buses temp. rerouted EB: Orange Line, Archer, Ashland & 35th; WB 35th, Ashland, Robinson and Archer: due to, street blockage near 35th/Paulina.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#35 31st/35th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near 35th/Paulina.

Eastbound buses will operate via Orange Line, Archer, Ashland and 35th.

Westbound buses will operate via 35th, Ashland, Robinson and Archer.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at 63rd. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are running with residual delays following earlier police activity at 63rd.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
